review: Like the Fire TV Stick better than the Chrome Cast if you have an Amazon Prime Account.  The stick let you play your music very easy from Amazon and watch your movies with ease.  The only downside is that the stick requires AC power which means it is not portable like Chrome Cast to view on various devices.  I like it because it have many more apps that are downloadable than Chrome Cast.  However, I wish I knew how to organize them once they are downloaded.  Also, I noticed that I have to remove the micro cord from the USB if I want to watch regular TV due to the interruption in the antenna feed.  Although I like this better than Chrome Cast and the other streaming devices, I would probably love it if it did not require AC power to the USB device so that it is more portable.  If Amazon makes that change the Fire TV Stick would be number one in my book.
